wikipedia_page.main: Steven Beckingham is a British actor and singer who was born on 6 November 1978 in Frimley Green, Surrey, England, United Kingdom. He has appeared in a few films and TV series including Heartbeat and the Doctor Who episode Dalek. He is now an acting teacher at West Linn High School in Oregon.

response: Intruder is a 2016 American horror film written and directed by Travis Zariwny. The film stars Steven Beckingham, Teresa Decher, Louise Linton, Susannah Mars, Mary McDonald-Lewis and Moby. The film was released on June 24, 2016, by IFC Midnight. Its plot follows a Portland, Oregon cellist who finds herself attacked by an intruder during a storm.
